ability.Dark World: On switch-in, summons Dark World for 5 turns. During this time, Dark-type attacks cause 1.5x damage and non-Dark-type attacks cause 0.75x damage.
ability.Lord of Dark: For one chance, when this Pokemon's HP zeroes, it revives with 50% maximum HP.

Dark Rainbow.effect: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. In Dark World, this move's type effect is always 1.

Shadow Ball.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Dark Dealings.effect: Raise the user's Atk., SpA. and Spe. by 2 stages at the cost of 50% of maximum HP.

Flash Cannon.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
